system.description: Ironwood is magical substance created from normal wood: as strong, heavy, and fire-resistant as steel. Spells that affect metal do not function on ironwood; spells that affect wood do, but ironwood does not burn. With wood shape or wood-related Craft checks you can create wooden items that function as steel (plate armor, swords, etc.); druids can use these freely. If you make half the normal amount, any weapon, shield, or armor so created gains a +1 enhancement bonus.

components.materialDescription: Wood shaped into the form of the intended ironwood object.

system.target: An ironwood object weighing up to 5 lb./level
